page.title: 12Shopping in Swansea
page.content: The city centre provides different types of shopping environment. {Kingsway and Oxford Street are {traditional shopping streets}with a variety of local and national stores. The council has tried to make shopping easier by creating pedestrian precints. Most of the big chain stores have moved into the{Quadrant {centre.}Shopping is very easy here because it is all under cover, and the atmosphere is pleasant because there is music, no litter and no graffitti. {The new covered market}replaces the one destroyed in the war. It is a fascinating place with all its food stalls, many of which have been in the same family for several generations. It is possible to buy all types of food including cockles and laverbread.
